content.question: The graph represents the angular velocity <math alttext="omega" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>ω</mi></math> of a fan as a function of time. What is the total angular displacement of the fan during the time shown on the graph?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator omega sub 1, end sub, t sub 1, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="omega sub 1, end sub, t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="omega sub 1, open parenthesis, t sub 2 minus t sub 1, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="omega sub 1, open parenthesis, t sub 2 minus the fraction t sub 1 over 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="omega sub 1, open parenthesis, t sub 2 minus the fraction t sub 1 over 2, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>ω</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
